website_summaries.verdict: This teeth grinding guard is versatile, affordable, and customizing it doesn't requiring sending it to a lab. However, it can also be difficult to fit and won't last as long as professionally-molded guards.
pros: Features a central bar structure that reduces grinding
Self-fitting and customizable for top or bottom teeth
Provides a comfortable fit for most customers
cons: Instructions could be better, and molding it may take several times
Some reports of it fitting too tightly if not molded properly

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this
customer_reviews.text: This is a great concept, but this one fails miserably. I have had to reform it at least 7 times and its still not wearable. Once it hardens, it is EXTREMELY tight on my teeth and yes, I have left it in, moving it back and forth during trying to form it. Trying to pull it out makes me feel like my teeth are going to come with it. I really wanted this to work, as my problem is clenching, not grinding, and this would work perfectly. Just miserable for me and a waste of almost $40. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: loves to shop

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for NTI night guards
customer_reviews.text: I lost my $600 NTI night guard fitted by my old dentist during a big move. My clenching only got worse since then (even resulting in gum disease). I was looking for something like the NTI guards that only cover the front teeth since full mouth guards wouldn't really stop the pressure onto my back molars. This was the best alternative at such a great price! Super easy to mold and remold if necessary, easy to maintain. The thermoplastic tightens a bit after cooling so it needs to be fitted a few times with some wiggling but you can retry many times until you get it right. Highly recommended, better than spending hundreds of dollars at the dentist!
customer_reviews.author: S H

customer_reviews.title: Relief of my grinding at night!
customer_reviews.text: I've had horrible jaw pain over the past few weeks from grinding my teeth when I sleep. Gave the GrindReliefN a try hoping it would git rid of my pain. Works great!! Way cheaper that the dentist made ones and works just as well. Will buy again. It was so easy to mold it to fit my mouth. Love that you can redo the mold to your mouth over and over if you need to. Highly recommend!! Get it if you have jaw pain from grinding when you sleep. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: V. Zabojnik

customer_reviews.title: I had such high hopes....
customer_reviews.text: After about the 5th time of reshaping per the instructions, I went to sleep with the appliance in place. Several hours later I woke and was unable to slide the guard off my top teeth; it was stuck! Ultimately I had to soak the device in almost boiling water poured into a shallow mug (while stuck in my mouth) for several minutes in order to pry it off. This did result in superficial burns to my lip and mouth of course. I can't even imagine how I would have gotten it off if it were stuck on the bottom teeth.
customer_reviews.author: PugHug

customer_reviews.title: Works Better than Advertised
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using originally GrindguardN and now GrindreliefN for almost 4 years. I was diagnosed with grinding my teeth and always woke with massive jaw pain. My dentist wanted 700 bucks to buy a guard. I looked on line and after extensive research, I purchased one of these 4 yrs ago. Let just say, amazing product and works better than advertised! Since my first purchase I have only had to replace it once, which is great. They last along time and work really well! I use mine every night. Chris
customer_reviews.author: Makailey3111

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I was very nervous trying to fit this to my teeth so it took me several tries to get it right. I have a mouth guard I got from my dentist at a cost of $300 and this product works as well if not better. My expensive night guard still lets me clench my jaws but this product does not. I love it and would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Kept falling off my lower teeth, despite proper fit
customer_reviews.text: I formed and reformed this multiple times, which was a great option to have, but no matter how well fitting it was, it kept falling off my teeth and into my cheek while I was sleeping. I wore it nightly for two weeks in hopes I'd get used to it and it would stay in place, but I woke up with far too many headaches from clenching my jaw after it had fallen out of place. It may work fine for others with different shaped teeth/jaws, but it was a mess for me. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: A.J. Acosta

customer_reviews.title: This is tough to mold to your teeth BUT ITS WORTH IT!!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about getting the bite right. Have someone help you to do it and FOLLOW THE DIRECTIONS! This helps tremendously. I Love this thing now and panic if I don't have it with me on a trip. But I make sure to pack it now. It may feel too tight or uncomfortable to begin with But Its true that once you get it in your mouth and relax YOU WILL LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: JannS

customer_reviews.title: No Gagging & Fast, Easy Fitting Process
customer_reviews.text: Because this fits on the front teeth, there's nothing poking the sensitive gag reflex area. I hesitated to buy this, worried the fitting process would be tedious and take a long time. Not so. I found it shrank some once it cooled off, so I had to soften and reshape it a couple times, but still it was quite easy and quick. The first night I used it, I was able to sleep comfortably all night without needing to remove it. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Kate

customer_reviews.title: Meh not great
customer_reviews.text: This product is annoying. Molding it was annoying. Not sure how much of the resin or whatever needs to be there. Instructions are semi vague. Figured it out, but they are uncomfortable and while they create a gap so you don't grind, doesn't take away the urge to grind or clench on the product. It's irritating my gums and I think moving my teeth. I was eating food and i was hitting teeth that never touched. Unpleasant
customer_reviews.author: Scared v

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use, had to soften several times to ...
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to use, had to soften several times to get fit right. When it hardened it was way too tight. Did what they suggested and it was still too snug. Ended up taking to my dentist and they had to use a grinder to get it too fit properly.
customer_reviews.author: DA

customer_reviews.title: Satified customer
customer_reviews.text: Better than all the others I have bought from stores or even paid hundreds from my dentist. The only thing I found a problem with was fitting. You need to wiggle it for a good bit when fitting because it can become tighter as it cools. Took me 3 or 4 tries. I use it on the lower teeth and it keeps my jaw open just enough. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: april

customer_reviews.title: It works and a simple process...
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant in getting a 'mouth guard' to wear when I sleep. I have worn mouthpieces for sports and never like wearing them. This little device is actually comfortable to wear and was easy to form to my teeth. Time will tell how effective this device will be in helping the problem I have with grinding/clenching my teeth during sleep. Would recommend this product before paying for a professionally made one by a dentist.
customer_reviews.author: plh

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works well
customer_reviews.text: I've been grinding my teeth for more than a decade and have tried a range of devices, most recently a professional NTI device. After my NTI wore out, I looked for an alternative and have been very happy with the GrindReliefN Grind Guard. Much cheaper than the professional device and seems equally effective. Following the instructions, it was easy to fit and simple to adjust the fit after the initial attempt. I just had to make mine a little looser, and it has been working well. I've used the device for over 6 months now and am very pleased. I will definitely buy another when the time comes and will recommend to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Try something different
customer_reviews.text: It was costly and it was too tight- even after remolding several times.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery H

customer_reviews.title: Best I’ve found
customer_reviews.text: You’ll not be disappointed in your purchase of this grind guard. I have used this product, GrindRelief, for the past six years and has helped beyond what the others promise. This guard is uniquely designed to keep you from even coming close to grinding your teeth. I would highly recommend this guard!
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected, but very happy
customer_reviews.text: This isn't a traditional mouth guard that covers all your teeth. It sits on the front four teeth or so keeping your back teeth from contacting each other. This was a little confusing at first but it's a great product. It can also be reminded as many times as you likw.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: I wanted for this to work
customer_reviews.text: I tried like 8 times to mold it properly and it just didn’t work. Every time ended up being too tight. Instructions were hard to follow
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, prefer this to the one from my dentidt
customer_reviews.text: I really like the fit of this mouth guard. One, it goes on either top or bottom, and it's just in the center 4 teeth (not all your top/bottom teeth). It's nice and snug without being too tight.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It is a little awkward at first but if you fit it right it's not that bad. Helps with not grinding\clenching. Better than the full mouth guards. I think it'll last a long time, hopefully. If not placed right I do drool more than normal, but that's about the worse of it.
customer_reviews.author: J.A.

customer_reviews.title: Grind relief
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these from the dentist that I paid $700 for. When it wore out I replaced it with an inexpensive guard from another company. The GrindRelifN is very similar to the one from dentist. I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kcaj

customer_reviews.title: Love the Smaller Size!
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for a nightguard that wasn't a full mouth "horseshoe" and the GrindRelief is perfect. I had a similar one from the dentist that cost me nearly $200, so I was thrilled to find this one. Now I can have a spare for travel without breaking the bank. Easy to use, but do watch the video. Wore for the first time last night and it was very comfortable. Definitely will keep a spare on hand!
customer_reviews.author: Scooter548

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for 2 years now and I love it. It works much better than the guard I bought thru my dentist for $150 and it got gross in less than 1 year. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: D. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Relieved the pain in my jaw and teeth.
customer_reviews.text: I have bin grinding my teeth all my adult life. After chewing through my latest dentist made guard l decided to try to find something much cheaper.I saw this on Amazon, and gave it a try.It took me three tries to get the fit right.It stays on my teeth all night,and when i get up in the morning my jaw and teeth good. Id recommend this to anyone looking to save money at the dentist.
customer_reviews.author: b donofry

customer_reviews.title: Great mouthguard - highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great mouthguard - highly recommended! Before purchasing the GrindRelief, I used another highly rated mouthguard that was worn on my top teeth with a bite plate for the molars. Upon waking, it seemed that my mouth was tense, and felt like the bite plates were actually causing grinding. Before that mouthguard, I used the NTI and unfortunately lost it. Found a great alternative for a fraction of the cost with the GrindReliefN Grind Guard. It is easy to fit, comfortable in the mouth and prevents grinding. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: HWinNY

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to do the trick. I've been clenching while asleep for years and years. I've cracked two teeth. Have never been able to use a dental night guard--It's always half way across the room when I wake up. The Grind Relief is comfortable and has remained throughout the night and I've since been waking up headache-free. I have fitted it for the upper teeth but I'd also like to try for the lower to see which is more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: H. Rein

customer_reviews.title: Easy to mold and wear
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this after my dentist said I have been clenching my teeth. It was pretty easy to mold it my mouth and pretty comfortable to wear at night.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Miralda

customer_reviews.title: Takes some getting used to, but way better than traditional night guards.
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this product for a couple of weeks, but it has already made daily headaches and ear ringing a lot better. I clench my jaws very tight at night and regular mouth guards weren't doing anything to prevent that. This product, because it's on the front teeth and do not allow my back teeth to come in contact, does help stop me from tightening my jaw while I sleep and thus helps alleviate sore jaw muscles and ear ringing.
customer_reviews.author: Tim K.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Works as advertised. I had a nervous habit of grinding my teeth. Using the GrindReliefN I have noticed the grinding has reduced. Very comfortable in my mouth. Forming instructions are simple and easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great price! great product!!! I couldn't be happier with this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Once the mold cooled down it was like it shrank and I couldn't get it on my ...
customer_reviews.text: Followed the directions and could not get a proper fit. Tried multiple times. Once the mold cooled down it was like it shrank and I couldn't get it on my teeth. I tried to fit it to my top and bottom teeth and neither worked. For the amount of money I paid, I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ann

customer_reviews.title: Pain Relief
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for almost 2 years and recently miss placed. I had to order again! Tried many different guards and this is the only one I have found to relieve force on my jaw muscles. I always have to try a couple times to get the right mold to my teeth, but once you get the right fit you won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandie Jack

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as the one the dentists make
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother to go to the dentist anymore for this appliance. This works just as well!
customer_reviews.author: joan

customer_reviews.title: It never felt comfortable. How am I supposed to fall asleep with ...
customer_reviews.text: It never felt comfortable. How am I supposed to fall asleep with a Lego brick in between my teeth? Not the product for me
customer_reviews.author: Elynn

customer_reviews.title: and I am able to sleep comfortably.
customer_reviews.text: Unlike many other self-fitting mouth guards, you can try again and again until you get the right fit. I combined this with an existing mouth guard that fits on my upper teeth, and this one goes on the lower front. Together they keep my upper and lower teeth from touching, and I am able to sleep comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: After watching the video it wasn't too hard to figure out. Very happy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Aliza

customer_reviews.title: My husband won't complain about me grinding my teeth at night anymore!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best appliances to stop my teeth from grinding. Had gotten the 'guard' that did nothing. Can't say enough good things about it!
customer_reviews.author: nobody000

customer_reviews.title: Mouth guard dud.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible horrible horrible. I followed instructions to the letter and the product was too goopy to form any kind of a guard against grinding. I would recommend a guard that I larger and more salvageable if you make a small error.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Y.

customer_reviews.title: Great Device that works and saves big money from the Dentist.
customer_reviews.text: I used to spend $500 for a mouth guard at a dentist. I have been using this one for over 10 years now. . It will stay in your mouth because you mold it to fit yourself. Easy to mold in a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Mark T.

customer_reviews.title: Instructions were great
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were great- it took me several times but the fit is great now thanks to the instructional video. Hoping this will help with clenching/ grinding.
customer_reviews.author: natmpetty

customer_reviews.title: Took me 3 times to get the perfect fit as it kept shrinking on me
customer_reviews.text: Took me 3 times to get the perfect fit as it kept shrinking on me, but after that, it's been amazing! I don't find myself spitting it out in the middle of the night. I'm grinding way less and wake up to my jaw feeling normal again. Would definitely recommend purchasing!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and effective
customer_reviews.text: I tried several different kinds of night guards even the expensive dentist provided ones but none of them except for GrindRelief N relieved my jaw pain from nightly tooth grinding. I am so glad I found this product. So easy to do and is much smaller. You don't have the usual gagging issues because it is much smaller than the horseshoe models.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: This really helped with my headaches from clenching/grinding. This center bar design addresses the issue to prevent grinding instead of other retainers that just protect the teeth but grinding still occurs. Just watch the video a few times before attempting to mold it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and comfortable to use
customer_reviews.text: Very simple instructions and the setup was excellent the first time. The night guard felt very comfortable and is certainly a lot less expensive compared to the nti device I had been using. Also I like that you can set it up for either the upper or lower arches.
customer_reviews.author: stocktrader

customer_reviews.title: Used this for years, tried others, going back
customer_reviews.text: I used this mouthguard for about five years without replacing it. It fits well, and lasts a long time. I have tried others and have not liked them, so I am going back! Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can’t bite this one!
customer_reviews.text: Love this guard because I physically can’t bite into it. Every other guard I’ve had (including a professional bite plate from the dentist) I’ve been able to bite into. This prevents that. Takes a little getting used to (I can hear myself trying to bite when I sleep) but it’s comfortable and easy to fit.
customer_reviews.author: abm480

customer_reviews.title: Adjusted my teeth
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this. I tried remolding it multiple times and watched the instruction video. When it gave me problems including shifting my bottom teeth and headaches, I contacted the company and they were no help at all. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: finally something that works!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very picky mouth. Every mouth guard seems to hurt or be very uncomfortable. This worked great and had no rough edges and didn't feel tight.
customer_reviews.author: C. Soy

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived in good time. Took awhile to get it to fit
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in good time. Took awhile to get it to fit, but follow instructions and be patient and you will figure it out. Will prevent grinding, however I also have sore jaw muscles from clenching. Has not helped me with that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great relief for grinding.
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to find this mouth guard! It was marketed under a different name the first time I purchased one. I love this product, it has helped! It is so easy to fit, takes less than 10 minutes overall.
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Work much better than the "traditional" night guards that protected my teeth
customer_reviews.text: Work much better than the "traditional" night guards that protected my teeth, but I chewed on which only gave me more pain.
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: My dentist recommended GrindReliefN for my grinding at night. It was easy to mold, with the help of the video, and very comfortable. Now, I won't sleep without it!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Kay

customer_reviews.title: takes a little work to get it right, and ...
customer_reviews.text: takes a little work to get it right, and then maybe a little adjustments/trims/sandings every few weeks. Works well for me on the upper
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, poor execution and design.
customer_reviews.text: I have TMJ and clench my jaw at night. I read that regular mouth guards were protecting my teeth, but probably made the clenching worse so I thought I'd give this a try. Sadly, this did not work for me at all. I had to re-size it several times, because when it dried it shrunk and wouldn't fit over my teeth. Eventually I got it to fit, but at night my clenching only moved to my front teeth. Then the guard would push over my bottom gums - painful. I like the idea of this guard which is why I'm giving it two stars instead of one, but it still has a long way to go in design and execution.
customer_reviews.author: mary_123

customer_reviews.title: Type my Dentist recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and form. Comfortable and helps with grinding back teeth. No more sore jaws in the morning. This is the type my dentist recommended.
customer_reviews.author: kkjake

customer_reviews.title: Finally found the solution to my bruxism.
customer_reviews.text: I have a cabinet shelf full of night guards for my bruxism. This one is “the Ticket” to no more headaches and neck pain not to mention tmj. I couldn’t be happier and healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like this product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product, my friend turned me on to the product before they were on amazon- the nights I dont use it my I wake up with a sore jaw, its really minimal on my upper teeth and doesnt rub against my gums or inner lips, also it serves as a retainer with its custom fit, just purchased one for my travel kit: )
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Best Grind Guard I've Found
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. I used this for my six year old who had been constantly grinding his teeth and driving me nuts. He slept well with it in his mouth as its not nearly as big as some of the other devices. I was also pretty cool that you could remold it as many times as you need it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Instructions
customer_reviews.text: This should have a warning that you should not use if you have ANY fillings in your front teeth, not loose fillings as it currently states. I used this for a couple of weeks and was pretty happy with it, until I woke one morning to find I had lost a filling on my front tooth that was very solid. Cost to replace - $220!! Waste of $40 plus the cost of the filling!! Wish I'd just bought one from the dentist now.
customer_reviews.author: georgepig

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't stay in!
customer_reviews.text: Fits great and is comfortable but it falls out every.single.night.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Shanahan

customer_reviews.title: Great product... No pain
customer_reviews.text: Super product. It really works for me. Today I wake UP without pain...
customer_reviews.author: Ruben A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to shape and use. Has eliminated my grinding! My dentist is happy.
customer_reviews.author: Cmvarnado12814

customer_reviews.title: Grind Guard mouthpiece
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mouth guard I have tried yet
customer_reviews.author: A C Konkol

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit. Hate the taste and after-taste that continues -like toxic plastic.
customer_reviews.author: chocolate doctor

customer_reviews.title: Great product, solid and comfortable .
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit and product . Followed the online video to ensure proper fit. Very easy and did not have any issues with wearing It All night without any discomfort or issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy, directions easy to follow and shipping fast
customer_reviews.text: I have had more expensive mouth guards fitted by dentists but this one works just as well for a fraction at the cost. Very happy, directions easy to follow and shipping fast.
customer_reviews.author: Luca Carnevale

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy it
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could get my money back for this. It costs twice as much as the best drug store products, but doesn't work half as well. Conceptually, this guard would be great, but whoever picked out the materials clearly didn't care about comfort or safety. The interior thermoplastic (the part that you melt and form to your teeth) expands while cooling, and hardens like a rock. This means that it is always too tight, and is so hard on my teeth that I worry they will break. My gums hurt in the morning after sleeping with it. I tried reforming several times and could never get around the material design problems.
customer_reviews.author: scimo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to mold, comfortable to wear. I am pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph L. Ayers

customer_reviews.title: Reduces jaw clenching
customer_reviews.text: I find this product fantastic to deal with my jaw clenching. Small in the mouth I don’t even notice I am wearing it
customer_reviews.author: Deb Woollett

customer_reviews.title: GrindReliefN Review
customer_reviews.text: Easy to fit and more substantial than I expected. Upper or Lower. Like it better than my NTI device.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Found it very difficult to get it to conform and hold shape within specified instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy to use and wear; very comfortable; just as good as my $300 one the dog chewed up!
customer_reviews.author: cheryl r

customer_reviews.title: Bulky
customer_reviews.text: The concept is good, but it was difficult to mold, I tried 4 times before I just gave up. Also, it's too bulky which makes it hard to close your mouth when you wear it. If it would have been shaped more like a dental guard and this size, it would have been a heaven sent.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: but it was difficult for him to mold and he said he felt like it wasn't worth the money
customer_reviews.text: my husband said its been working for him, but it was difficult for him to mold and he said he felt like it wasn't worth the money. Fast shipping tho
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Pace

customer_reviews.title: Very Helpful Device
customer_reviews.text: A great solution for my night-time jaw clenching and teeth grinding. Easy instructions for customizing the fit.
customer_reviews.author: msraems

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This ship did NOT INCLUDE THE MOLDABLE INSERT, only one plastic component Moldable insert snaps into. REFUND ASAP. SCAM
customer_reviews.author: M.Anders

customer_reviews.title: SCAM - Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy - not worth the money. Most of these reviews are paid for by the company.
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: Can't live without it
customer_reviews.text: I recently broke a back molar from grinding and clenching at night and had to have it removed. I had tried other mouth guards in the past, but they were always too bulky, or caused my to bite down at night because they were seated on my molars. This grind guard stopped that. It only sits on my front 6 bottom teeth, and doesn't allow my back teeth to touch at all. It took about a week to get use to, but I love not waking up with jaw pain, or fear that I'm going to break another tooth. Thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Pearl A. Maxey

customer_reviews.title: Works Very Well For Clenching
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several guards to protect my teeth from grinding and clenching at night. I was using a full mouth horse-shoe shaped guard most recently. Even though it helped reduce wear on my teeth, it did not relieve pressure on my teeth which caused soreness the next day. The GrindReliefN fits on the front teeth only, which means your back teeth do not make contact at all, even when clenching. This completely stopped my tooth pain after a couple of nights use. It can be a little tricky to form, but there is no limit to how many times you can try, so it worked out great. The best guard I've used!
customer_reviews.author: 79MKII

customer_reviews.title: Stops my grinding and clenching!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my second one this time because it does get work out with constant use. This is the only mouth guard that works for me and well worth thencost.. It keeps me from clenching my jaw and grinding my teeth. I can feel my jaw relax when I put it in at night. It is not easy to get it to fit correctly but it is well worth the effort. It is good that you can reheat and try again as much as needed because I needed a few tries.
customer_reviews.author: kel

customer_reviews.title: Compares well with $500 custom guards
customer_reviews.text: Sure, the $500 custom mouth guard is a better fit to your exact bite. But only a little bit better. This one can be customized to fit your upper or lower teeth perfectly; it just can't fit both bites simultaneously. So it is just a bit less comfortable than the expensive one I used to have, which my dog chewed up. This one does work quite as well as it needs to -- and if the dog gets it, I'm only out $35!
customer_reviews.author: RTLmommy

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Been wanting something more than the thin tooth protector that was so expensive from the dentist. That didn't help my grinding and clenching. This thing is just what I have been looking for!! It holds my mouth open just enough that I don't clamp down all night and wake with sore jaw muscles. Did not have any problems with fitting it. It did take about 3 tries, but that was just to get it as comfortable as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Spooky

customer_reviews.title: While it's not as comfortable as an NTI
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from severe bruxism. I used to rely heavily on my NTI appliance, but the last several broke only one or two weeks after having them made. After suffering through a month of tension headaches brought on by a more traditional full bite splint, I ordered this. While it's not as comfortable as an NTI, it's a hell of a lot better than the full splint.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Aytch

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you form the night guard correctly
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Subjectively it seems that it helps with the intensity of the grinding. The only issue that I have is that you can’t make any mistakes while forming the nightguard and that it will usually end up being very tight unless the mouthguard is loosened. The first time I made the night guard one side of my jaw hurt a lot because I didn’t make it even. One side of the jaw would close more than the other side. Once I fixed the issue and loosened the grip it had on my teeth it works perfectly. Already bought a few more and consider this to be the best night guard out there.
customer_reviews.author: HCE

customer_reviews.title: Won’t buy again and don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: It is the third time I try to give it shape because I find it very uncomfortable I did not like and can’t even wear it for longer that 10 minutes I’ve used mouth guards for hockey before this is 100 times worse
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes

customer_reviews.title: Best Grind Guard
customer_reviews.text: Even our dentist approves. I had an expensive one made by my dentist. It wasn't comfortable and eventually created a problem with a crown placed afterward. This one allows you to redo, should never have another problem.
customer_reviews.author: C4Gigi

customer_reviews.title: works great for clenching
customer_reviews.text: i tried a couple of other bite guards. they were junk. this was easy to mold and use. i really like that its on my front teeth and not the back ones. really helps me from clenching my teeth. will definately get again when needed
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle

customer_reviews.title: Different type of guard
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been helping with my teeth clenching. It's nice that you can remold this as often as you need to. It took some time to get used to it but now I don't notice it while I sleep. My jaw is feeling better after using this so it must be working.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I work in a dental office and have had numerous expensive guards made. None of them worked. Clenched my teeth so bad at night I was beginning to get mobility, jaw pain, tooth pain. This little guard works!! Prevents your teeth from coming together. Does not allow the clenching unlike full mouth guards. May not work for everyone's situation, but has been a life saver for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Marie Connelly

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome! I’ve tried sooo many mouthpieces for clenching - ...
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! I’ve tried sooo many mouthpieces for clenching - this is the first that REALLY helps - no temple pain when I wake up - will def buy another
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Does exactly what it's supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Does exactly what it's supposed to do, less annoying than the one I got from my dentist, which was much larger in your mouth, hard to talk, and way cheaper. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: EDEN

customer_reviews.title: I dont know what happened to make this nightguard so ...
customer_reviews.text: I dont know what happened to make this nightguard so uncomfortable. But it is extremely hard to mold, as once it hardens the shape changes a bit. I started experiencing pain in the bottom teeth it came in contact with. I had to stop wearing it and the pain went away. It's a bit of a let down considering how much this was.
customer_reviews.author: yvm

customer_reviews.title: ... out after countless soft night guards and it seems like it is working
customer_reviews.text: Trying this out after countless soft night guards and it seems like it is working. Took me a few times to get the guard not super tight but I love that you can adjust it however many times you need to get it to fit just right.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd one I've purchased. Been using this guard since August 2015. I love it! Can't sleep without it now.
customer_reviews.author: JMat

customer_reviews.title: Works as promised. Ended my ear aches!
customer_reviews.text: Works as promised. Ended my ear aches! My ENT doctor recommended this.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald L. Wesselmann

customer_reviews.title: I reheated this several times to try to get it ...
customer_reviews.text: I reheated this several times to try to get it to fit just right. I cannot close my mouth with it in. I tried it for a week but I just couldn't get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: R Nix

customer_reviews.title: I love this product I have been using it for years ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this product I have been using it for years best mouth guard out there. Before I have to buy a new mouth guard every month with this one last most of a year. Can’t beat it I hope it’s around a long time
customer_reviews.author: josie brockman

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my NTI night guard
customer_reviews.text: I used this to replace my overpriced NTI night guard. Not perfect but excellent option for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Murray

customer_reviews.title: Really snug fit.  Best grind guard out there.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best grinding guard yet. Snaps in really tight, so it isn't going anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Read

customer_reviews.title: I've had a better bite guard from my dentist but that cost me ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality bite guard for a low cost. I've had a better bite guard from my dentist but that cost me $600. Will buy again. Thinking about getting a 6 pack in case they decide to stop making them.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

product_meta.title: GrindReliefN Grind Mouth Guard
product_meta.description: Smaller, easier to wear. GrindReliefN is one-third the size of typical horseshoe-shaped bite guards, night mouth guards or TMJ mouth guards. Works better. Its Central Power Bar causes nerve reflex to reprogram muscles and reduce grinding or clenching. GrindReliefN is guaranteed to outperform devices costing $800 or more. Can be reformed as many times as you like. Lasts longer. Central force focus reduces grinding forces, therefore, GrindReliefN does not wear out as fast as other devices. FDA cleared to treat teeth clenching. Formerly known as GrindGuardN.
feature_bullets: Can Reduce Grinding Forces by 60% or More
